TopicTitle: Appature Science Personality Core Recovery ( WARNING GAME SPOILERS!!!!!)

Articles.Content:
WARNING: SPOILERS FOR PORTAL 2. IF YOU DON"T WANT THE GAME RUINED DO NOT SCROLL DOWN.

You have been warned!

If you have played Portal 2 then you might know what I'm talking about. At the end of the game Chell shoots a portal to the Moon. This forces Evil Wheatley along with a couple other cores to be sucked into space. Now they are pretty dang expensive ( Sentient AI and all that ) so GLADOS plans to get them back, because she feels bad for them ( She was sweet to a person that killed her soooooo).

Story 1

Atlas and Peabody get the test subjects out, and GLADOS uses them for her mini space program, though they have larger heads, smaller bodies, became short, and became green (No tech is perfect)

Story 2

Atlas and Peabody get the test subjects out, and gain GLADOS' trust. GLADOS' "Core" gets tranferd into a ship and she flies the ship to there.

Outside the fourth wall

Wheatlety, Space Core, Adventure Core, and Intellegence core will be launched useing one of my Saturn V's They will be in the universe's most messy orbit.
